item.description:
We have 1 appetizer, would anyone have time to create a few appetizers?
Would be great to have about 3-4 different appetizers.

Cost should be about $15/person, if 17 people attend.
$16/person if 16 people attend.
$17/person if 15 people attend.

Please bring at least $15 plus a few $1 bills.

The theme is a Bordeaux Vertical

The agenda is:
o Greeting wine
o Educational topic - Wine Flaws
o Taste Vertical
o Cellar Tracker Info
o Mystery Wine
o AWS News
.
Mike

AWS Meetup Group
item.name: The AWS Wine May Meetup
